content: > **free pattern ** you can find the written pattern here 1 you can > find a video tutorial here 2 you > can find a pdf version of this pattern > with some additional sizes here 3 > buy 3 patterns or more and get 20% off > on the entire purchase no coupon is > needed happy crocheting this is a listing for a crochet baby hat - cute ribbed beanie **sizes ** newborn baby toddler child teen adult **materials** yarn dk weight 100% acrylic paintbox yarns simply dk and chunky weight 80% acrylic and 20% wool grundl shetland crochet hook 4 0 mm g/6 you will also need a pair of scissors stitch markers a yarn needle pompom maker **stitches ** chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet **number of pages in pdf ** 3 **in the pdf ** written instructions step by step photo tutorial and video tutorial **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy 1 http //wp me/p4q07q-j7 2 https //youtu be/jhzb5qw40sg 3 https //www etsy com/listing/494952446/crochet-pattern-super-easy-crochet ref=shop_home_active_1
